In reply to @rbuckton:matrix.org
is is not a MemberExpression, so x is a and {}.toString would just be a syntax error
ok...? I do not quite understand how this works, can you explain more? now it is a relational expression, that already makes x is {}. toString illegal?

content.body: Yes, if `is` is in RelationalExpression, then `is {}.anything` is illegal
content.formatted_body: Yes, if is is in RelationalExpression, then is {}.anything is illegal

content.body: `a in b.c` is legal because the right-hand side of `in` allows MemberExpression.
content.formatted_body: a in b.c is legal because the right-hand side of in allows MemberExpression.
